summary: After spending decades in a Siberian Gulag labor camp, Roman Catholic priest Kiril Lakota is set free by Russian leader Piotr Ilyich Kamenev at the height of the Cold War
cast: Anthony Quinn|Laurence Olivier|Oskar Werner|David Janssen|Vittorio De Sica|Leo McKern|John Gielgud|Barbara Jefford|Rosemary Dexter|Frank Finlay|Burt Kwouk|Arnoldo Foà|Paul Rogers|George Pravda|Clive Revill|Niall MacGinnis|Marne Maitland|Isa Miranda|Gerald Harper|Leopoldo Trieste|Peter Copley|Arthur Howard|Jean Rougeul|John Frederick|Åke Lindman|Lex Monson|Dom Moor|Alfred Thomas
title: Las sandalias del pescador
